title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Culturally Adaptive Instruction for Multilingual Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peer learners' cultural preferences using the CDLF survey tool and propose at least three communication strategies reflecting the analysis
Learners achieve an 85%+ task completion rate by applying negotiation techniques to resolve conflicts arising from cultural differences in multicultural team projects
Learners demonstrate the ability to select contextually appropriate expressions considering cultural context during language use, scoring ≥3.5 on a 4-point evaluation scale
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
